document.title: Hot Topic: Emergency Assistance and Mutual Aid in Tennessee: 2004 Update
document.abstract: For occurrences that your city cannot handle, you may use the Mutual Aid and Emergency and Disaster Assistance Agreement Act of 2004 to get help.
